WorkItem.ClosedComment: Please reopen (with the log files) if you're still having trouble with the 0.8.2.0 installer.
WorkItem.Description:
When trying to install TypeScript v.0.8.0 the installation process fails.

OS: Microsoft Windows 7 N Ultimate 64 Bit.
FW: .NET Framework 4.5 
VS: Visual Studio 2012/2010 and 2008

See attached screenshot.

Thank you,

Comments.Message:
Hi Skovanden,
For us to see what's wrong with your TypeScript installation we need you to send us some log files. You can generate the setup log by:
1) download msi file
2) open CMD and navigate to setup folder
3) Msiexec /I TypeScriptSetup.msi /l*v TypeScript.log 

After you send the TypeScript.log we can investigate this issue and get back to you ASAP. 
Thanks!
